quote: The future depends entirely on what each of us does every day a movement is only people moving.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: The country that is more developed industrially only shows, to the less developed, the image of its own future.
author: Karl Marx

quote: Planning ahead is a measure of class. The rich and even the middle class plan for future generations, but the poor can plan ahead only a few weeks or days.
author: Gloria Steinem
